column2: this was a surprise.  I wasn't sure what to expect after friends hyped this place up
column3: but it's worth the wait in line on a Sunday morning.  Croissants were super flaky and buttery and the coffee is pretty good
column4: and I'm not a coffee drinker.  I wasn't sure I would be able to tell the difference between these pastries and those from elsewhere
column5: but they definitely put some work into getting them just right
column6: and it shows.  Well worth the extra expense.
